column1: My sister just told me it's xenophobic to say the #coronavirus was produced in a Chinese Biolab.... what is this world we live in..?

I'm really caught on the fence between considering true danger to the #coronavirus situation or writing it off as media fear mongering

I'd like to believe that as long as you have good hygiene and are reasonable in precautions everything is ok. No need to overreact
